document_data.name: Know Time
document_data.mainbody: '''''Know time''''' was a [[divine magic|divine]] [[divination]] [[spell]] from the [[time sphere]] that enabled the caster to determine the precise time of day.
document_data.Effects: ''Know time'' was particularly useful if the caster had lost time from a bout of unconsiousness or similar situations. Time determined was accurated to the exact year, month, day, and hour.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
document_data.History: The ''[[Scepter of Mystra]]'', a relic of the [[Mystra]]n faith, could cast the ''know time'' spell.{{cite book/Prayers from the Faithful|77-80}}
